motions.title: Motion to Adjourn
motions.description: Motion to adjourn the special called meeting after second public hearing on 2024 millage rate of 3.040 mills.

publicHearings.title: Public Hearing for Establishing 2024 Millage Rate
publicHearings.description: Second of three required public hearings for proposed 2024 millage rate of 3.040 mills. One speaker opposed (Bob Hickey requesting rollback to 2.873 mills), none in favor.
publicHearings.recommendation: Staff recommends adoption at July 8th meeting
